SALESFLASH.description: This variable will be used in the Quarter list box and will change the field based on the value in the vSC_DateType field

SALESFLASH.name: vSC_date_PeriodField
SALESFLASH.description: This variable will be used in the Period list box and will change the field based on the value in the vSC_DateType field

SALESFLASH.name: vSC_date_MonthField
SALESFLASH.description: This variable will be used in the Month list box and will change the field based on the value in the vSC_DateType field

SALESFLASH.name: vSC_date_DayOfMonthField
SALESFLASH.description: This variable will be used in the Day of Month list box and will change the field based on the value in the vSC_DateType field

SALESFLASH.name: vSC_date_CalendarDateField
SALESFLASH.description: This variable will be used in the CalendarDate list box and will change the field based on the value in the vSC_DateType field

SALESFLASH.name: vSC_date_WeekField
SALESFLASH.description: This variable will be used in the Week list box and will change the field based on the value in the vSC_DateType field

SALESFLASH.name: vSC_date_DayOfWeekField
SALESFLASH.description: This variable will be used in the Day of Week list box and will change the field based on the value in the vSC_DateType field

SALESFLASH.name: vSC_date_HolidayField
SALESFLASH.description: This variable will be used in the Holiday list box and will change the field based on the value in the vSC_DateType field

SALESFLASH.name: vSC_date_FLAG_YTD
SALESFLASH.description: This variable will be used to allow users to set the YTD flag for the values in the vSC_DateType field

SALESFLASH.name: mod_CY
SALESFLASH.description:
Formula Modifier for Current Year based on the SelectYear variable and taking into account whether user has selected Fiscal Or Calendar Year
This variable will be used in the Formulas spreadsheet to modify existing formulas/expression.

SALESFLASH.name: mod_PY
SALESFLASH.description:
Formula Modifier for Previous Year based on the SelectYear variable and taking into account whether user has selected Fiscal Or Calendar Year
This variable will be used in the Formulas spreadsheet to modify existing formulas/expression.

SALESFLASH.name: mod_YTD
SALESFLASH.description: Formula Modifier for YTD flag.  Will only return transactions that have the YTD flag set to TRUE.  It will take into account the type of date being used by the user (Insert, Posting or Create)

SALESFLASH.name: mod_Prev_YTD
SALESFLASH.description: Formula Modifier for the Previous YTD flag.  Will only return transactions that have the Previous YTD flag set to TRUE.  It will take into account the type of date being used by the user (Insert, Posting or Create)

SALESFLASH.name: vinputAccrualStartDate
SALESFLASH.description: Defines the beginning date for the report

SALESFLASH.name: vinputAccrualEndDate
SALESFLASH.description: Defines the ending date for the report

SALESFLASH.name: vandProd_ProductSet
SALESFLASH.value:
='SUM({<$(vAndProd_ProductSetAcctOrAdOrder)=' & Concat(Distinct {$} '{"=COUNT({<ProductName={' & chr(39) & ProductName, chr(39) & '}>} AccountNumber_AdBase)>0"}*')
  & chr(39) & '}>} $(vAndProd_ProductSetAcctOrAdOrder))>0"}$(vAndProd_ProductClear)>} $(NetRevenue))'

SALESFLASH.name: vChurnPrevYear
SALESFLASH.description: AGGR function that returns revenue for customers in Previous Year

SALESFLASH.name: vChurnCurrYear
SALESFLASH.description: AGGR function that returns revenue for customers in Current Year

SALESFLASH.name: vChurnType
SALESFLASH.description: If MONTH, then show Churn by Month chart; if YOY, show YOY Churn

SALESFLASH.name: vChurnDynCurrMonth
SALESFLASH.description: Used for Monthly Churn calculations (this is the current Month formula)

SALESFLASH.name: vChurnDynPrevMonth
SALESFLASH.description: Used for Monthly Churn calculations (this is the previous Month formula)

SALESFLASH.name: vChurnDynMonthField
SALESFLASH.description: Dynamic field for the Month field in the monthly churn chart

SALESFLASH.name: vShowTotals
SALESFLASH.description: Flag to be used when using code to show and hide totals in a pivot table.  In base version this is only in the Preprint report on the Advertising tab as an example.

SALESFLASH.name: vsysCurrentSelections
SALESFLASH.value: =if(vsysShowCS = 1, '  Click Here To Hide', if(isnull(GetCurrentSelections()), '  Nothing selected', GetCurrentSelections(' | ', ': ', ',',0)))
SALESFLASH.description: Used in the DisplayCurrent Selections boxes.

SALESFLASH.name: vsysShowCS
SALESFLASH.description: Flag to determine if we should show or hide a current selections object

SALESFLASH.name: vsysFormulaCreatorTemp
SALESFLASH.description: A variable that will hold the formula being created by Formula Creator.

SALESFLASH.name: vLoadOldAcctNums
SALESFLASH.description: Flag to determine if we should load old accountnumbers

SALESFLASH.name: vReloadVariables
SALESFLASH.description: Used in SOURCE_ to determine if this spreadsheet should be reloaded.  Turned on and off in the application NOT here.

SALESFLASH.name: vLoadCRM
SALESFLASH.description: Used in SOURCE_ to determine if CRM data will be loaded.  Turned on and off in the application NOT here.

SALESFLASH.name: vLoadPRPSchedule
SALESFLASH.description: Used in SOURCE_ to determine if Preprint schedule information from Core will be loaded.  Turned on and off in the application NOT here.

SALESFLASH.name: vLoadBudget
SALESFLASH.description: Used in SOURCE_ to determine if Budget spreadsheet information will be loaded.  Turned on and off in the application NOT here.

SALESFLASH.name: vLoadCustomScripts
SALESFLASH.description: Used in SOURCE_ to determine if Custom Scripts should be loaded.  If true, Source file will look in CustomScripts\SalesFlash\*.qvs

SALESFLASH.name: vExcludeGLs
SALESFLASH.description: Used in SOURCE_ to determine if ExcludeGLs information should be read and processed from the SystemSheet.xls -> GLExcludeList

SALESFLASH.name: vLoadAdvRevenue
SALESFLASH.description: Used in SOURCE_ to determine if we are to load revenue from the fctInsertSummary and Detail tables. Can increase load times significantly

SALESFLASH.name: vShowHelp
SALESFLASH.description: Used to show and hide help text boxes.

SALESFLASH.name: vsysButtonColorOn
SALESFLASH.description: On sheets with a button bar down the side, this will be the color of the button selected.

SALESFLASH.name: vsysButtonColorOff
SALESFLASH.description: On sheets with a button bar down the side, this will be the color of the buttons NOT selected.

SALESFLASH.name: vLastActivityDate
SALESFLASH.description:
Return the most recent (could even be in the future depending on expression) insertion date for every customer.  
This expression will return the last insert date for customers and could be in the future:
=DATE(AGGR(MAX({1} InsertCalendarDate),AccountNumber_AdBase))
You can also limit the dates that the expression looks for the last insertion.  The expression below will search for the last insert date before one month ago Today.
=DATE(AGGR(MAX({1} InsertCalendarDate),AccountNumber_AdBase))

SALESFLASH.name: vOSUser
SALESFLASH.description: User logged into the application.

SALESFLASH.name: SelectYear
SALESFLASH.description: Used for Year over Year caclulations

SALESFLASH.name: vFiscalOrCalendarYear
SALESFLASH.description:
Allows the user to do YOY comparisons based on the Fiscal or Calendar Year.  Will be either Posting_CalendarYear or Insert_CalendarYear.
Sample Dimension Usage:
=$(=$(vFiscalOrCalendarYear))
Sample Expression Usage:
SUM( {<$(=$(vFiscalOrCalendarYear)) = {$(=$(SelectYear))}>} $(NetRevenue))

SALESFLASH.name: vFiscalOrCalendarYearLabel
SALESFLASH.description: Label for the List boxes, Dimensions and Expressions that use the Dynamic Year and month/period fields

SALESFLASH.name: vFiscalOrCalendarMonthPeriod
SALESFLASH.description:
Dynamic field that can be used in Dimensions.  This will allow the user to select whether they see Insert/posting/create and Calendar(month) or Fiscal(period).
=$(=$(vFiscalOrCalendarMonthPeriod))

SALESFLASH.name: vFiscalOrCalendarMonthPeriodLabel
SALESFLASH.description: Label to be used for the charts that use this Dynamic Dimension

SALESFLASH.name: vFiscalOrCalendarPrevYTD
SALESFLASH.description:
Sets the YTD Flag based on the Date settings - Controlled by YTDSwitch Macro
Capitalize('$(vSC_DateType)') & '_FLAG_PreviousYTD'

SALESFLASH.name: vFiscalOrCalendarYTD
SALESFLASH.description:
Sets the YTD Flag based on the Date settings - Controlled by YTDSwitch Macro
Capitalize('$(vSC_DateType)') & '_FLAG_YTD'

SALESFLASH.name: vsysShowAdvancedSheets
SALESFLASH.description: When true, shows the Formulas, Formula Creator and Tables and Fields sheets.

SALESFLASH.name: vbtnsFinance
SALESFLASH.description: Controls which reports are showing on the Finance sheet

SALESFLASH.name: vbtnsAdvertising
SALESFLASH.description: Controls which reports are showing on the Advertising sheet

SALESFLASH.name: vbtnsReference
SALESFLASH.description: Controls which reports are showing on the Reference sheet

SALESFLASH.name: vbtnsCRM
SALESFLASH.description: Controls which reports are showing on the CRM sheet

SALESFLASH.name: vTab
SALESFLASH.description:
Used on Selection Criteria tab to determine which side tab is active.  
OPTIONS: DateActive, ProductActive, SalesActive or OtherActive

SALESFLASH.name: vQSTab
SALESFLASH.description:
Used on all reporting tabs to determine which Quick Selection Ribbon tab is active. 
OPTIONS: DateActive, ProductActive, SalesActive, GLActive or OtherActive

SALESFLASH.name: vSC_DateType
SALESFLASH.description: Holds either INSERT, POSTING or CREATE.  Used to dynamically change Date List boxes.

SALESFLASH.name: vFiscalOrCalendarFlag
SALESFLASH.description: 0=Calendar, 1=Fiscal

SALESFLASH.name: vGL_BUCKET_1
SALESFLASH.description: The Expression here will be the new field name for use in SalesFlash.qvw

SALESFLASH.name: vGL_BUCKET_2
SALESFLASH.description: The Expression here will be the new field name for use in SalesFlash.qvw

SALESFLASH.name: vGL_BUCKET_3
SALESFLASH.description: The Expression here will be the new field name for use in SalesFlash.qvw - You do NOT need to fill in all of these

SALESFLASH.name: vGL_BUCKET_4
SALESFLASH.description: The Expression here will be the new field name for use in SalesFlash.qvw - You do NOT need to fill in all of these

SALESFLASH.name: vGL_BUCKET_5
SALESFLASH.description: The Expression here will be the new field name for use in SalesFlash.qvw - You do NOT need to fill in all of these

SALESFLASH.name: vGL_BUCKET_6
SALESFLASH.description: The Expression here will be the new field name for use in SalesFlash.qvw - You do NOT need to fill in all of these

SALESFLASH.name: vinputTopNNN
SALESFLASH.description: User entered, number of top/bottom performers to show.

SALESFLASH.name: vInactiveDays
SALESFLASH.description: Used along with the vLastActivityDate to determine if a customer should be returned on the "inactive customer" report.  This will be the initial number of Inactive Days shown.

SALESFLASH.name: vsheet_Finance
SALESFLASH.description: 1 = Show Sheet; 0 = Hide Sheet

SALESFLASH.name: vsheet_Advertising
SALESFLASH.description: 1 = Show Sheet; 0 = Hide Sheet

SALESFLASH.name: vsheet_RevCompare
SALESFLASH.description: 1 = Show Sheet; 0 = Hide Sheet

SALESFLASH.name: vsheet_Budget
SALESFLASH.description: 1 = Show Sheet; 0 = Hide Sheet

SALESFLASH.name: vShowAdvancedSheets
SALESFLASH.description: Shows/hides Reference Charts, Tables & Fields, Formulas, Formula Creator tabs

SALESFLASH.name: vDaysInPreviousYear
SALESFLASH.description: Returns the number of days in the CurrentYear -1 (Previous Year)

SALESFLASH.name: vGaugeFillToSegment1
SALESFLASH.description: First segment of Gauge from Zero to Lower bound of Segment2.

SALESFLASH.name: vGaugeFillToSegment2
SALESFLASH.description: Second segment of Gauge from Lower bound of Segment2 to end.

SALESFLASH.name: vGaugeFillToOverSegment
SALESFLASH.description: This is the color of the whole gauge if the expression exceeds the bounds.  If gauge is from 0 to 100 and we have 142, this color would show.

COMMON.name: vsysButtonColorOn
COMMON.description: On sheets with a button bar down the side, this will be the color of the button selected.

COMMON.name: vsysButtonColorOff
COMMON.description: On sheets with a button bar down the side, this will be the color of the button NOT selected.
